mapper.insert: insert into tb_suggest(user_id, content, update_time, delete_flag) values(#{userId},#{content},#{updateTime},1)
mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.account,u.password,u.`name` userName,u.first_letter firstLetter,u.phone userPhone,u.attendance,u.role_id roleId,u.head_image headImage, r.parent_id parentId,r.`name` roleName,r.company_id companyId,c.`name` companyName,c.introduce,c.address,c.email,c.phone companyPhone,c.logo,c.report_work reportWork,c.out_work outWork from tb_user u inner join tb_role r on u.role_id=r.role_id and u.user_id=#{userId} inner join tb_company c on r.company_id=c.company_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId}

select * from tb_user where 1=1
and (account=#{account} or phone=#{account})
select company_id from tb_role where role_id=#{value}
select type from tb_company where company_id in( select company_id from tb_role where role_id=#{value})
select count(*) from tb_role where delete_flag=1 and parent_id=#{value}

select t1.module_id as moduleId,t2.name,t2.usable from tb_company_module t1 INNER JOIN tb_module t2 on t1.module_id=t2.module_id where t1.company_id =( select company_id from tb_role where role_id = (select role_id from tb_user where user_id=#{userId} and delete_flag=1) and delete_flag=1) and t1.delete_flag=1 and t2.delete_flag=1 order by t2.order_list asc

select t2.module_id as moduleId,t2.name,t1.usable,t1.useful_time from tb_company_module t1 INNER JOIN tb_module t2 on t1.module_id=t2.module_id where t1.delete_flag=1 and t1.company_id=#{companyId} and t2.delete_flag=1 order by t2.order_list asc
select user_id as userId,name,first_letter as firstLetter from tb_user where role_id in(${value}) and delete_flag=1 GROUP BY first_letter,userId
select user_id as userId,name from tb_user where delete_flag=1 AND role_id in(select role_id from tb_role where company_id =#{companyId})
select user_id as userId,name from tb_user where delete_flag=1 AND role_id in(select role_id from tb_role where company_id =#{companyId})
select name from tb_user where user_id=#{userId}
